title: Seishun Sanka!
sinopse:
Hoshiro, who had studied earnestly in order to impress girls with his brains, ended up in an all-boys high school! Now what? Well, it's off to the school's legendary wish-granting Tanuki Statue to pray for love! But what happens when his earnest wishes are overheard by the school idol?

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
